activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12957
activity.text:
> does anyone have any suggestions, I am trying but have not been able to solve it yet. [@Denyme24](https://github.com/Denyme24) [@Jacobjeevan](https://github.com/Jacobjeevan)

well are you trying to do the changes in the `TagAssignmentSheet.tsx` ? 
if yes try doing this ‚¨áÔ∏è
Change this to: `<PopoverContent className="w-[320px] p-0" align="start">`
this: `<PopoverContent className="w-[320px] p-0 max-h-[300px] overflow-y-auto" align="start">`

We added max-height to stop the popover from growing too tall, and overflow-y-auto to make it scrollable when there's too much content.

i think that should work, give a try

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12891
activity.text:
Hey Team @Jacobjeevan, @rithviknishad , i have fixed the issue locally . **Issue:** OTP error message didn‚Äôt update on language switch because the translated string was stored in state. Before: `const [otpError, setOtpError] = useState(""); ` `setOtpError(t("send_otp_error")); ` `{otpError &&

{otpError}

}` But Changing language didn‚Äôt update the error text, it stayed in the old language. so now we Store a boolean flag instead, and call t() during render: `const [otpError, setOtpError] = useState(false);` `setOtpError(true); ` `{otpError &&

{t("send_otp_error")}

}` and also added the missing translation keys in the language files. Now, the message updates automatically when the language changes. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8e6b464f-4fb2-4521-9428-e05ef15cba39

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12509
activity.text:
@rithviknishad, I gave the suggested approach a try, but I ran into a limitation with React Hook Form‚Äôs onChange mode. It only re-validates the field that was updated, so when manufacture_date changes, it doesn‚Äôt automatically re-validate expiration_date, even though it's dependent on the updated value.

Because of that, the validation logic didn‚Äôt work as expected with this method. I‚Äôm happy to explore alternative solutions if needed

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12403
activity.text:
Hi team, looking to make my first contribution! My approach:

Made the following changes:

* Added red asterisk for required fields in Location and Department forms using Tailwind CSS.
* Updated button disable logic:

  * Location form: disabled if unchanged or invalid.
  * Department form: disabled if unchanged or loading.
* Used React Hook Form's `isValid` and `isDirty` for validation.

EOD: Changes done locally and self reviewed.

Approach:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b8d82f5f-f83b-4faf-9bbc-4abb9dcfd329
